title: Dreamtime this time dreamtime (A)
creator_credit: Aboriginal Arts Board and Air Programs International
brief_description: An animated treatment of the Aboriginal legends using children’s illustrations from the book “An Aboriginal children’s history of Australia” is intercut with live footage concerning various Aboriginal issues.
